name: Mooney Loops
description:
Hello,

I build this game in 4 days with almost 300 lines of code and big credit to George Blackwell that uploaded the asset of pixel playing cards to itch.io .

In this game you can control time and loop it back to a certain point. You are using this wonderful powers for Gambling every time you lose you can loop back so now you know what's under the deck and win there will be some situations where it is not possible to win.

Hope You enjoy it.

Regards,

Platinum Monster.
